Text:
Amazing movie! Love your torrents, specially the attention to detail and bit rate you choose to transcode your movies.

Can you please upload The Girl with The Dragon Tattoo along with David Fincher's commentary, the one you uploaded doesn't have commentary.

Hello,

Can someone tell me if there are any torrents for Man on a motorcycle and Pitch Black Heist? I love Fassbender but I couldn't find the short films anywhere.

Thanks,
Efren
+1 for Dragon Tattoo with  commentary. Thanks.
Sorry guys, but a re-up of Dragon Tatto is very unlikely. I wanna listen to the commentary too tho...
Great as always. Please upload more movies like this one. And if it's possible with spanish subs.
